name: A wicked looking crimson hood
data: It increases the users dexterity impressively.
It has pathetic armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration adequately.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users psionic resistance strongly.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'dodge'.
This hood is rumoured to be able to clear persons mind if they happen to be
